name: @hyperscape/physx-js-webidl
description: Node.js-compatible Javascript/WASM bindings for Nvidia PhysX 5.6.0
author: fabmax

scripts.prebuild: [ -f dist/physx-js-webidl.js ] && [ -f dist/physx-js-webidl.wasm ] && echo 'PhysX already built, skipping...' || ./generate-node.sh
scripts.build: [ -f dist/physx-js-webidl.js ] && [ -f dist/physx-js-webidl.wasm ] && echo 'PhysX already built, skipping...' || ./make-node.sh
